body_html: I encountered a similar problem while trying to connect two models. It looks like always adding a name argument to the call to tf.map_fn() is a temporary workaround. Otherwise, it seems that the while ops will always end up in the same name scope, and only the loop condition ops in distinct name scopes.

body: I encountered a similar problem while trying to connect two models. It looks like always adding a name argument to the call to tf.map_fn() is a temporary workaround. Otherwise, it seems that the while ops will always end up in the same name scope, and only the loop condition ops in distinct name scopes.
